name: Salomon RS Prolink Boots - Unisex
description: Push off with confidence in Salomon's RS Prolink boot. With an ultra-supportive cuff, this boot provides solid lateral support in a trim but comfortable performance fit. The mouldable liners provide custom comfort, great for passionate skating enthusiasts who want proven performance.3-D mesh interior fabric wicks sweat to improve breathability.One-pull Quicklace system tightens precisely with polygliding hooks and a tough Kevlar lace.Adjustable heel strap keeps your feet locked in place.Active Energizer cuff offers progresive support that allows your muscles to relax and provide fast ski return.Fibreglass reinforced plastic chassis for strong heel support and torsional rigidity.Carbon skating plate provides power at the end of the kick.Prolink soles are NNN and Prolink compatible and provide a low-profile boot–binding connection for exceptional snow feel.
